page.title: University of Sydney Faculty of Science

revisions.rev:
{{Infobox university |image_name = University of Sydney new logo stacked.png |image_size = |name = Faculty of Science |established = 1882 |type = [[Public]] |dean = Trevor Hambley |city = [[Camperdown, New South Wales|Camperdown]] / [[Darlington, New South Wales|Darlington]] |state = [[New South Wales]] |country = [[Australia]] |affiliations = [[University of Sydney]] |students = |staff = |campus = |website = [http://sydney.edu.au/science/ sydney.edu.au/science] }}
The '''Faculty of Science''' is a constituent body of the [[University of Sydney]], [[Australia]]. It was established in 1882.
In 2011 the Faculty had a total student enrolment of 6,077 (12.4% of all students), thus making it the University's third-largest.<ref>http://sydney.edu.au/strategic_planning/statistics/enrol/enrol.php?ci=3&type=fac&yr=2011</ref>
At the undergraduate level, the Faculty offers the Bachelor of Science (also existing in two additional streams: Advanced; Advanced Mathematics), Bachelor of Liberal Arts and Sciences, Bachelor of Psychology, and the Bachelor of Medical Science.
Presently, the Dean of the Faculty is Professor Trevor Hambley.
==History== Teaching of science at the University began in 1852 (University was est. 1850), however the first professors were based within the Faculty of Arts. The Faculty of Science itself was established in 1882.<ref>http://www.science.usyd.edu.au/about_us/history.shtml</ref>
The first professor of mathematics and natural philosophy was [[Morris Birkbeck Pell|Morris Pell]], who was appointed in 1852.<ref>http://adbonline.anu.edu.au/biogs/A050475b.htm</ref>
==Organisation==
The Faculty is divided into 7 schools, 1 unit and 11 disciplines (also known as departments): * [[University of Sydney School of Biological Sciences|School of Biological Sciences]] * [[University of Sydney School of Chemistry|School of Chemistry]] * [[University of Sydney School of Geosciences|School of Geosciences]] * [[University of Sydney School of Mathematics and Statistics|School of Mathematics and Statistics]] * [[University of Sydney School of Molecular Bioscience|School of Molecular Bioscience]] * [[University of Sydney School of Physics|School of Physics]] * [[University of Sydney School of Psychology|School of Psychology]]
* [[University of Sydney Unit for History and Philosophy of Science|Unit for History and Philosophy of Science]]
* [[University of Sydney Discipline of Agricultural Chemistry|Discipline of Agricultural Chemistry]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Anatomy and Histology|Discipline of Anatomy and Histology]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Information Technologies|Discipline of Information Technologies]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Pathology|Discipline of Pathology]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Pharmacology|Discipline of Pharmacology]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Physiology|Discipline of Physiology]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Environmental Science|Discipline of Environmental Science]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Human Nutrition|Discipline of Human Nutrition]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Infectious Diseases and Immunology|Discipline of Infectious Diseases and Immunology]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Molecular Biotechnology|Discipline of Molecular Biotechnology]] * [[University of Sydney Discipline of Soil Science|Discipline of Soil Science]]
